subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Orioles sustained a painful fourth straight loss to the Red Sox, 12-1, on Patriot’s Day at Fenway Park, but a scary moment in the third inning left one Oriole with a lump far more real.
snippet: The Orioles sustained a painful fourth straight loss to the Red Sox, 12-1, on Patriot’s Day at Fenway Park, but a scary moment in the third inning left one Oriole with a lump far more real.
